metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2053 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
getID3() before 1.9.8, as used in ownCloud Server before 5.0.15 and 6.0.x before 6.0.2, allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files, cause a denial of service, or possibly have other impact via an XML External Entity (XXE) attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2053` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-getid3 - 1.9.8-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> owncloud packages in Ubuntu are now empty

criterions.comment: php-getid3 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.8-1').
